award_title: Quantum Spin-Mechanics with Color Centers in Diamond
subject: Reducing friction around sharing spin-mechanics code
body:
Hi Dr. Wang,

I'm reaching out to researchers working in quantum information and spin-mechanical systems. Given the complexity of diamond spin-mechanics experiments—GHz Lamb wave resonators, phononic crystal designs, spin-qubit coupling analysis—I imagine there's a fair amount of computational work that accumulates and gets asked about.

Ouro helps researchers share computational tools and datasets in a way that's actually usable and durable, rather than a zip file buried in supplementary materials. It consolidates the work you're already doing—sharing code, answering emails about methods, digging up old scripts—into a single endpoint that lasts.

Happy to get your group a look if it's helpful.

Hope winter break gives you some downtime. Happy holidays.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
